mapper.insert: insert into wa_creditor_authentic_info (user_id, apply_date, mgr_date, income, liabilities, cash_flow, qualifition, tax, other1, other2, other3, other4, state, comment ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mgrDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{income,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liabilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualifition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
